name: 高等光電工程
restrict: ◎必須先修過【OEC8122  高等光電固態物理】 ◎課程開放上修
description: 本課程是OEC 8122光子學高級固態課程的延續；該課程的暫定每週時間表如課程進度表所示。
goals: Understand the fundamental physics of semiconductor optoelectronics.
syllabus:
This course is the continuation of OEC 8122 Advanced Solid State in Photonics. Tentative weekely schedule of this course is indicated below.

week 1-2: Tight-binding method & Gaphene bandstructure calculation  

week 3-4: Density of states & Distribution function 

week 5: Semiconductor tunneling devices 

week 6: Semiconductor optics I: Lorentz and Drude model; Optical constants

week 7: Semiconductor optics II: Interband transition

week 8: Midterm exam

week 9: Semiconductor optics III: Time-dependent perturbation theory; Fermi golden rule

week 10: Semiconductor optics IV: Intersubband transition 

week 11: Excition

week 12: Phonon

week 13-14: Polariton; Microcavities

week 15: Semiconductor light emitting diodes

week 16-17: Semiconductor lasers

week 18: Semiconductor photodetectors

week 19: Final exam & Presentation
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【OEC8122  高等光電固態物理】
